etc.aloe.data
Interface LabelableItem

All Known Implementing Classes:
Message, Segment
public interface LabelableItem

Represents an object that can have true and predicted labels.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Boolean getPredictedLabel()
          Get the predicted label of the item.
 java.lang.Double getPredictionConfidence()
          Get the confidence in the predicted label.

          Get the gold-standard label of the item.
 boolean hasPredictedLabel()
          True if the item has a predicted label.
 boolean hasPredictionConfidence()
          True if the item has prediction confidence.

          True if the item has a gold-standard label.

          Set the predicted label.
 void setPredictionConfidence(java.lang.Double predictionConfidence)
          Set the confidence in the predicted label;

          Set the gold-standard label of the item.
 

Method Detail

getTrueLabel

java.lang.Boolean getTrueLabel()
Get the gold-standard label of the item. The label is null if the item is unlabeled.
